name: Vagabond's Road: The Quest for the Stonebound Heart
name_original: Vagabond's Road: The Quest for the Stonebound Heart
description:
Vagabond's Road: The Quest for the Stonebound Heart is a text based adventure game lovingly inspired by classic MUDs and TTRPGs. In that classic style, you will type your way to victory, solving puzzles, exploring locations and talking to interesting people.

And travel you must. You, a lowly vagabond, have been chosen by the Stonebound Heart, an ancient elven artifact from before the realm of Eacorath was even called such. You must claim it's godly power from the hands of the previous champion, a man only calling himself the King Eternal, before he can stop the cycle of chosen ones forever. To do so, you must travel the Vagabond’s Road, from Whitewick all the way to Blackstone, where the Hall of the Stonebound lies.

Eacorath needs you, chosen one. The fate of the realm rests on your shoulders.

Prove you are more than just a vagabond.
